text: Umberto Antonio Tozzi (born 4 March 1952) is an Italian pop and rock singer and songwriter. Throughout his career, he has sold over 70 million records in different languages internationally, and his biggest international hits are: "Stella Stai", "Gloria", "Tu" and "Ti Amo". ==See also== *Moony *Prezioso *Sabrina Salerno *Laura Branigan *The Flirts *Radiorama *Benny Benassi *Giorgio Moroder *Loredana Cannata *Ricchi e Poveri *Gina G. *Linda Jo Rizzo Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Italian singers
title: Umberto Tozzi
